name: Jennifer O'Brien
coverLetter:
Hello,
My name is Jennifer and I've been trimming for about 20 years for personal use only.
I've helped trim for friends farms too.
I'm a single mother of a soon to be 14 yo young man, & I'm a caregiver. 
I believe in the healing powers of marijuana and I'm positive that I could be an asset to the trimming team!
